content.text:
# AVN Award for Best Supporting Actress

| holder         = Chanel Camryn
| website        =
}}
The AVN Award for Best Supporting Actress is an award that has been given by sex industry company AVN since the award ceremony's inception in 1984. As of January 2025, the titleholder is Chanel Camryn.
